content.content: From Decentraland we want to hear your thoughts about an initiative we are trying to push mostly related for tokens which need active content.   github.com/ethereum/EIPs      Issue: EIP-2229: Ping Interface  	 	opened by nachomazzara 	on 2019-08-05 	 	 	  eip: 2229 title: EIP-2229: Ping Interface author: Ignacio Mazzara <nachomazzara@gmail.com> status: Active type: Standards Track category: ERC created: 2019-08-03 Abstract Almost every asset created by Ethereum smart contracts has...
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is proposing a new Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP-2229) related to tokens that require active content. The author is asking for feedback and explaining the proposal. A third party is advertising the proposal and asking questions about it, while also giving entirely positive feedback.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal
